### Multiple linear regression with exponential-normal prior

A multi-variable Bayesian linear regression model using an exponential-normal prior.

```{r multiple_linear_greta}
# the predictors as a matrix
design <- as.matrix(attitude[, 2:7])

int   <- normal(0, 10)
tau   <- zeros(ncol(design))
coefs <- zeros(ncol(design))
sd <- cauchy(0, 3, truncation = c(0, Inf))

for (i in seq(ncol(design))) {
  tau[i] <- exponential(.5) 
  coefs[i] <- normal(0, tau[i])
}

mu <- int + design %*% coefs

distribution(attitude$rating) <- normal(mu, sd)
```
